name: Love - It's Contagious
description:
Dr. Chase Darkflower is having the busiest week of his life. He's got surgeries to perform, women to seduce, and the hospital administrator is breathing down his neck. On top of all that, there's a crazed killer on the loose! How will it all end?

Only you can decide! Guide Chase through his day-to-day decisions and moral quandries, and maybe you can find true love along the way.
